Package controllers

Class SchedulingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.SchedulingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class SchedulingController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller of SchedulingMenu.fxml. The class displays a TableView and various buttons to modify and interact with the information inside the tables.
    Since:
    2021-12-13

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method is called when the controller is loaded. The methods is used to populate the function combination box, and fill the page with all necessary info from the repository.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • onActionFuncComBUpdated

        public void onActionFuncComBUpdated​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called when on option is selected from the combination box at the top of the screen. The method opens a new page respective to the option selected by the user.
        Parameters:
        event - high-level event used to set the Stage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - required by the FXMLLoader.load() function

      • onActionAddAppt

        public void onActionAddAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called when the "Add" button is clicked. This method sends the user to AddAppointmentMenu.fxml.
        Parameters:
        event - high-level event used to set the Stage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - required by the FXMLLoader.load() function

      • onActionUpdateAppt

        public void onActionUpdateAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called when the "Update" button is clicked. This method sends the user to UpdateAppointmentMenu.fxml.

        RUNTIME ERROR: The method will display an error if the user has not selected an appointment from the tableview.

        Parameters:
        event - high-level event used to set the Stage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - required by the FXMLLoader.load() function

      • onActionDeleteAppt

        public void onActionDeleteAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "Delete" button is clicked. This method will remove the selected Appointment from the database and update the repository and tableview accordingly.

        RUNTIME ERROR: The method will display an error if the user has not selected an appointment from the tableview.

        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • onActionNoneRB

        public void onActionNoneRB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "None" radio button is clicked. This method will show all customer Appointments in the tableview.
        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • onActionWeekRB

        public void onActionWeekRB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "Week" radio button is clicked. This method will show all customer Appointments, of the date range specified in the text boxes below it, in the tableview.
        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • onActionMonthRB

        public void onActionMonthRB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "Month" radio button is clicked. This method will show all customer Appointments, of the date range specified in the text boxes below it, in the tableview.
        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • onActionPrevDate

        public void onActionPrevDate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "Prev" button is clicked. This method will change the date range of Appointments displayed by either minus 1 week or month based on the radio button selected.
        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • onActionNextDate

        public void onActionNextDate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the "Next" button is clicked. This method will change the date range of Appointments displayed by either plus 1 week or month based on the radio button selected.
        Parameters:
        event - is not used

      • fillApptTableView

        public void fillApptTableView​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> apptList)
        This method is used by other methods within the class. This method will populate the table view with all Appointments passed in as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        apptList - contains all Appointments to be displayed in the table view

      • fillSortedApptTableView

        public void fillSortedApptTableView​(java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                    java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        This method is used by other methods within the class. This method will populate the table view with a Appointments sorted via a date range.
        Parameters:
        startDate - specifies the starting date of the date range to be sorted by*
        endDate - specifies the ending date of the date range to be sorted by
